original: “Yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko majjhe nagarasiṅghāṭake nisinno passeyya puratthimadisato
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja nagara guttikaḥ majjhe nagara siṅghāṭake nisinnaḥ passeyya puratthima disataḥ

original: purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya dakkhiṇadisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya pacchimadisato
analyzed: purisam āgacchanta passeyya dakkhiṇa disatas purisam āgacchanta passeyya pacchima disatas

original: purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ, passeyya uttaradisato purisaṁ āgacchantaṁ;
analyzed: purisam āgacchanta passeyya uttara disatas purisam āgacchanta

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yañca puriso cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yat ca puriso cakkhunā rūpam passati tam viññāṇena vijānāti

original: Yañca sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
analyzed: yam ca sotena saddam suṇāti tam viññāṇena vijānāti

original: Yañca ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
analyzed: yam ca ghānena gandham ghāyati tam viññāṇena vijānāti

original: Yañca jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
analyzed: yam ca jivhāya rasam sāyati tam viññāṇena vijānāti

original: Yañca kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti, yañca manasā dhammaṁ vijānāti, taṁ viññāṇena vijānāti.
analyzed: yam ca kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusati tam viññāṇena vijānāti yam ca manasā dhammam vijānāti tam viññāṇena vijānāti
evam kho mahā rāja vijānana lakkhaṇam viññāṇan ti
